description: We're joined by San Francisco's own Under The Golden Gate, a web series dedicated to underground art and culture here in the bay, filming behind the scenes as Billy "The BodySlam" Santoro takes on Eli "The Hammer" Hunter. In BodySlam's previous match, he lost to Marcus "Titan" Ruhl but due to an unfortunate back injury, Titan was unable to compete in the tournament, so redemption is on the line today! The Hammer comes in cocky as ever, promising to wipe the mat with his opponent and fuck his ass into submission. Will BodySlam take this golden opportunity for a second chance in the tournament and come out on top? Or will he lose once again and have to take every inch of Hammer's big hard cock deep in his ass?
title: Summer Smackdown Tournament Quarter Finals - Match Two
